quoteText: • The right to be forgotten. You may at any time delete any materials you have uploaded and delete your Account, in which case all the information stored on the Account will be deleted completely and in full
title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service
tosdr.tldr: The right-to-be-forgotten is adhered to by idka: "You may at any time delete any materials you have uploaded and delete your Account, in which case all the information stored on the Account will be deleted completely and in full".
